articles.title: Kim Jong Il Inspects Rakwon Machine Complex
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Inspects Rakwon Machine Complex
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il provided field guidance to the Rakwon Machine Complex alive with a high-pitched drive for effecting a great surge.
					 He saw a five cubic meter "Jangbaek" excavator newly manufactured by the complex.
					
					 Watching the excavator at work, he expressed great satisfaction over the fact that the officials, workers and technicians of the complex successfully contrived and manufactured the large-size excavator in a brief span of time. 
					
					 Noting that many more machines and equipment including excavator are needed in the socialist construction sites, he underscored the need to boost the production of quality machines to send them to various fields of the national economy.
					
					 He made the rounds of various places including the technologically updated hydraulic apparatus shop and the construction machine designing institute to acquaint himself in detail with the technical equipment and production. He highly estimated the shining successes made by the workers there. 
					
					 Having the Rakwon Machine Complex and other machine-building  bases which have been put on a high level of CNC basis, we can manufacture any large-size machines if we have a will, he said, adding that  this stirring reality eloquently proves that the Juche-oriented machine-building  industry of the DPRK has proudly attained the world level of the latest science and technology.
					
					 It is the great achievement that the complex laid a firm technological foundation for bringing the hydraulic technology to the world level in a brief span of time, he noted, calling on the people to push back the frontiers of latest science as required by the age of knowledge-based economy when carrying out technological updating just as it was done by the complex. 
					
					Very pleased that the workers of the complex have brought about eye-opening miracles and innovations in their worthwhile drive to achieve the prosperity of the country and improve the standard of people's living, he repeatedly appreciated their efforts. 
					
					 Noting that the complex has done a lot of work in recent years, he urged the complex to bring about uninterrupted innovations and advances in the same spirit as displayed by them. 
					
					 He underscored the need for the officials of the complex to steadily raise the level of their guidance to production so as to minutely manage and operate the complex on the principle of profitability and, at the same time, pay deep attention to the supply service for its workers. 
					
					  He once again set the goal to be attained by the complex in the near future and specified tasks and ways to do so. He showed such great benevolence as unraveling knotty problems. 
					
					  On the same day he went round a newly built football stadium in the province. 
					
					  Looking round the exterior and interior of the stadium built in a peculiar style at the picturesque foot of a mountain, he expressed great satisfaction over the fact that it was successfully built as required by the new century. He extended high appreciation and deep thanks to the members of the young shock brigade of the province for building such stadium of eternal value. 
					
					 Underscoring the need for service persons to widely use the stadium to train their physical bodies, he set forth tasks to be fulfilled to manage and operate it. 
					
					 He was accompanied by Kim Phyong Hae, chief secretary of the North Phyongan Provincial Committee of the WPK, Kim Kyong Hui and Thae Jong Su, department directors, and Ju Kyu Chang and Ri Jae Il, first vice department directors of the WPK Central Committee.

articles.title: National Meeting Marks Kim Jong Il's Start of Work at WPK
articles.content:
National Meeting Marks Kim Jong Il's Start of Work at WPK
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- A national meeting took place at the April 25 House of Culture here Friday to mark the 46th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Attending the meeting were senior party, army and state officials, officials of the party, armed forces and power bodies, public organizations and ministries and national institutions, servicepersons of the Korean People's Army, officials in the fields of science, education, culture and arts, public health and media and working people in the city.
					
					 Choe Thae Bok, alternate member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK and secretary of the C.C., the WPK, in his report said that Kim Jong Il's start of work at the C.C., the WPK on June 19, Juche 53 (1964) with the iron will to accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche generation after generation was a historic event of epochal significance in the development of the WPK and the revolution.
					
					 Kim Jong Il considered it as his lifelong task to strengthen the WPK as a party of President 
						Kim Il Sung from the very day he began his work at the C.C., the WPK and clarified the philosophical principle that a revolutionary party is, in essence, the party of the leader and a political organization tasked to materialize his idea and ensure his leadership and successfully applied it to the party construction and activities, he said, adding:
					
					 Thanks to the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il who has pursued benevolent politics of love and trust and an all-embracing politics in all fields, the WPK could lead the people to carve out their destiny, fully responsible for it, despite the world-wide great political upheaval, turn the whole society into a harmonious large family and steer the cause of socialist construction enjoying absolute support and trust of the popular masses.
					
					 Noting that it is the consistent principle Kim Jong Il has maintained in the whole course of leading the WPK for a revolutionary party to defend socialism and victoriously advance it by tightly holding arms, the reporter referred to the fact that he has firmly prepared the KPA as an army of the leader and the party and a-match-for-a hundred revolutionary army.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 The WPK led by Kim Jong Il has resolutely frustrated every political and military provocation of the separatist forces at home and abroad and firmly adhered to the line of independent reunification under the banner of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, milestones of national reunification. It also further raised the international authority and prestige of the country despite complicated world situation and extraordinarily boosted the international solidarity with the Korean revolution.
					
					 Kim Jong Il is a great symbol of the ever-victorious WPK and the destiny of the country and the nation.
					
					 We will consolidate in every way the military base of the country the core of which is the KPA by steadily giving priority to implementing the line of Songun revolution of the party in the future, too, and provide a firm military guarantee for the building of a thriving socialist nation and accomplishment of the cause of national reunification and the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 The south Korean group of traitors is now getting frantic with its unprecedented conspiratorial moves to escalate confrontation with the DPRK after orchestrating the case of sinking of a warship of the puppet army in collusion with the U.S. imperialists. This has pushed the inter-Korean relations to a total collapse and created such tense situation on the Korean Peninsula that a war may break out right now. 
					
					 If the U.S. and Japanese reactionaries and the puppet group of traitors finally ignite a war despite the repeated warnings of the DPRK, all its servicepersons and people, their hearts burning with towering resentment and hatred, will courageously turn out in the just struggle to defend the country and deal merciless blows at any act for "punishment" and "retaliation" and "sanctions" encroaching upon its state interests, eradicate the root cause of aggression and war and surely build a reunified thriving nation on this land.
					
					 We will strengthen unity and solidarity with the progressives in the world, holding high the banner of independence, peace and friendship in the future, too, develop relations with those countries friendly to the DPRK and wage a dynamic struggle for stability on the Peninsula and global peace.
					
					 Having Kim Jong Il at the highest post of the WPK, it will always make victorious advance as a party of the President and a force steering the Songun revolutionary cause and its future will always be in safe hands, the reporter concluded.

articles.title: Tunisian PUP Leader Interviewed
articles.content:
Tunisian PUP Leader Interviewed
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA)-- Mouhammad Bouchiha, secretary general of the People's Unity Party (PUP) of Tunisia, was interviewed by a reporter of KCNA at Pyongyang Koryo Hotel Friday. 
					 The secretary general said at the interview that General Secretary Kim Jong Il started his work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea 46 years back, adding that seminars and lectures on his works, film shows and other colorful events are taking place in various countries on this day. 
					
					  Kim Jong Il, a creditable successor to the revolutionary cause of President Kim Il Sung, has developed the WPK into an ever-victorious party deeply rooted among the popular masses through his outstanding ideological and theoretical activities and with his dynamic leadership, he noted, and continued: 
					
					 The Songun politics is the most effective and unique political mode. 
					
					  The DPRK is a great country resolutely struggling against the moves of the imperialist allied forces. 
					
					 The Korean people are dynamically advancing towards a bright morrow despite the tense situation because they are under the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 Our party voices full support and solidarity with the WPK and the Korean people decisively foiling the moves of the imperialists. 
					
					 We will as always make positive efforts to boost the friendly ties with the WPK.

articles.title: Tunisian PUP Delegation Leaves
articles.content:
Tunisian PUP Delegation Leaves
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the People's Unity Party (PUP) of Tunisia headed by Secretary General Mouhammad Bouchiha wound up its visit to the DPRK and left for home on Friday.
					 During its stay the delegation visited President Kim Il Sung's birthplace at Mangyongdae and the e-library and the indoor swimming pool at Kim Il Sung University.
					
					 It also visited Kim Il Sung Higher Party School, the Tower of the Juche Idea, the Mansudae Art Studio and the Ostrich Farm on the outskirts of Pyongyang.

articles.title: Documentary Film Screened
articles.content:
Documentary Film Screened
Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- Korean documentary film "Great Guidance Leading Our Party to Only Victories" was screened at the April 25 House of Culture on Friday on the occasion of the 46th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The film tells about the undying leadership feats of Kim Jong Il who developed the WPK organizationally and ideologically and enhanced its leading role upholding the banner of the Juche idea, thereby registering great victories in the revolution and construction.
					
					 At the early period of his start of work at the Central Committee he, regarding it as his lifelong task to build the WPK into the Party of President Kim Il Sung, formulated the revolutionary idea of the President as the unique idea guiding our era and proclaimed it as the supreme program of the WPK to model the whole society on the Juche idea. Scenes showing these historical facts touched the heartstrings of the audience.
					
					 The film made an impressive historical representation of the revolutionary activities of Kim Jong Il who worked heart and soul to make the Party a strong force guiding the cause of Juche with his outstanding ideology and theory and extraordinary political calibre.
					
					 Also contained in the film are the facts that he brought up the service persons of the Korean People's Army to be a-match-for-a-hundred soldiers and defenders of the socialist country and the youth to be the reliable reserves of the Party, thereby providing a sure guarantee for the final victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche. 
					
					 Among the audience were senior Party, army and state officials, officials of ministries and national institutions and working people in Pyongyang.

articles.title: Feats of Kim Jong Il in Socialist Movement
articles.content:
Feats of Kim Jong Il in Socialist Movement
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- Forty-six years has elapsed since General Secretary Kim Jong Il started working at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) on June 19.
					 During the period, he has turned the WPK into an invincible party of President Kim Il Sung and led it to fully discharge its mission and role in an effort for victorious advance of socialism.
					
					 With socialism collapsed in east European countries towards the close of the last century, the imperialists, advertising the "end of socialism" and the "victory of capitalism", tried hard to stifle the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					
					 At that time, Kim Jong Il published a famous work, "On the Fundamentals of Revolutionary Party Building", to provide guidelines of party building to progressive parties and people aspiring after socialism.
					
					 He also clearly indicated the guidelines of revolutionary party building and activity and the way to be followed by the socialist movement of the world in other famous works, including "Abuses of Socialism Are Intolerable" and "Socialism Is a Science".
					
					 So the socialist movement has greeted a new turning point.
					
					 In particular, the Pyongyang Declaration "Let Us Defend and Advance the Cause of Socialism" adopted in April Juche 81 (1992) has served as a powerful weapon and inspiring banner to rescue the world socialist movement from crisis and to propel it.
					
					 When the declaration was adopted, forty-eight leaders and representatives from 70 parties across the world signed it.
					
					 The parties that signed the declaration until now total over 270.
					
					 Tremendous are the feats performed by Kim Jong Il in successfully steering the era of independence with outstanding ideological and theoretical activities and distinguished leadership.

articles.title: Many Works on Ideological Work Published
articles.content:
Many Works on Ideological Work Published
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- 15 years have passed since General Secretary Kim Jong Il published the famous work "Giving Priority to Ideological Work Is Essential for Accomplishing Socialism".
					 The work, published on June 19, Juche 84 (1995), comprehensively expounds the essence of the ideological work under socialism, its basic duty and principle and ways for carrying them into practice. It, therefore, serves as an immortal banner for accomplishing socialism.
					
					 For the past 15 years since then he has authored many works one after another to defend socialist ideology and theories and develop them in depth as required by the developing reality, thus indicating the path for accomplishing socialism.
					
					 They include "The Workers' Party of Korea Is the Party of the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung", "The Songun-based Revolutionary Line Is a Great Revolutionary Line of Our Era and an Ever-Victorious Banner of Our Revolution", "The Democratic People's Republic of Korea Is a Socialist State of Juche with Invincible Might" and "On Preserving the Juche Character and National Character of the Revolution and Construction".
					
					 They underscore the need to intensify the education in the Juche idea and conduct in depth the information service on the Songun politics guided by the Juche idea.
					
					 They also indicate the popular and independent character and the invincible might of the DPRK, in which the Juche idea is embodied in the state-building and activities, and elucidate the problems of firmly preserving the principle of Juche, the principle of national sovereignty in the revolution and construction.
					
					 They contain the idea that big efforts should be sustained to educate officials and working people in the revolutionary traditions and arm them with the spirit to carry on uncompromising struggle against the U.S. imperialists and class enemies.
					
					 Also expounded in them is the idea that working people should make a leap forward and innovation in building an economic power and positively conduct ideological education to bring the advantages of Korean-style socialism into full play.

articles.title: Magnolia, National Flower of Korea
articles.content:
Magnolia, National Flower of Korea
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- Many people have visited the Central Botanical Garden in Pyongyang to enjoy the scenery of magnolia in bloom.
					 Magnolia is now in flower in different areas of the country including botanical gardens.
					
					 The white flower of magnolia represents the wisdom and noble and strong spirit of the Korean people.
					
					 With inverse oval petals, glossy dark-green leaves, many strong branches and sweet odor, magnolia is called "king of flowers" in Korea.
					
					 Magnolia was named national flower at the suggestion of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Some time ago, Czech newspaper Halo Noviny wrote about the magnolia as follows: In Korea the magnolia flower, which purports trust and purity, symbolizes love, happiness, hope, future and firm faith. The flower, loved by all the Korean people, is cultivated in rural areas, villages, working places, schools, recreation centers and other places of the country.

articles.title: Joint Statement of Parties and Organizations Hailed
articles.content:
Joint Statement of Parties and Organizations Hailed
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- Political parties and organizations of the DPRK issued a joint statement. This was a timely measure to cope with the grave situation prevailing today when the south Korean puppet conservative group has brought the north-south relations to a collapse and is working with bloodshot eyes to provoke a war of aggression against the north in collusion with foreign forces after violating the June 15 joint declaration and persistently blocking its implementation.
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday says this in a signed commentary.
					
					 The principled stand clarified by the above-said joint statement contains key and indispensable issues arising in settling the grave situation and accelerating the victorious advance of the cause of national reunification, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 It is the only way of saving the inter-Korean relations from a collapse to respect and implement the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.
					
					 If the above-said declarations are to be defended and implemented, it is necessary to positively achieve the great unity of Koreans from all walks of life at home and abroad supporting and upholding them. The DPRK's stand is unchangeable to closely grasp hands with any political forces, organizations and individual figures in south Korea and overseas supportive of the inter-Korean declarations in the spirit of "By our nation itself" and discuss and resolve the issues of inter-Korean relations and reunification. But it will sternly punish in the name of the nation anyone negating the June 15 joint declaration and behaving quite contrary to its spirit.
					
					 The U.S. should roll back its hostile policy towards the DPRK, take its hands off the Korean issue and discontinue its unjust actions obstructive to the implementation of the June 15 joint declaration. The Lee Myung Bak group should be ousted from power as it is going mad with the moves to escalate the confrontation and start a war in collusion with aggressor foreign forces.

articles.title: Preserving Juche and National Character Called for
articles.content:
Preserving Juche and National Character Called for
Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "On Preserving the Juche Character and National Character of the Revolution and Construction" is a monumental work clearly indicating the way of frustrating the imperialists' moves for domination, protecting the country's sovereignty and achieving national prosperity.
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday observes this in a signed article.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The work, published on June 19, Juche 86 (1997), expounds the essence of the issue of preserving the Juche character and the national character of the revolution and construction and its importance and significance and the theoretical and practical issues arousing in holding fast to the revolutionary principle. 
					
					 Thanks to this effective ideological and theoretical weapon provided by Kim Jong Il the army and people of the DPRK have been able to decisively meet the political and military pressures and foil the ideological and cultural poisoning of the imperialists, hold high the socialist banner of Juche and glorify the nation's dignity before the whole world.
					
					 Preserving the Juche character and national character provides a fundamental guarantee for firmly protecting the independent dignity of the country and the nation and to preserve them is an important requirement for building a self-reliant thriving nation on the land of the country. 
					
					 To give play to the Juche character and national character is a basic requirement for steadfastly preserving the true nature of socialism and giving full play to the advantages of Korean-style socialism.
					
					 The Juche character and national character being immensely glorified by Kim Jong Il serve as an ideological and moral engine for the victorious advance of the Korean revolution and an eternal soul of the Korean people, concludes the article.

articles.title: S. Koreans Called on to Judge Puppet Regime
articles.content:
S. Koreans Called on to Judge Puppet Regime
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- Members of south Korean civic and public organizations including the Confederation of Trade Unions and the Solidarity for Progress held a rally in Seoul on June 13 to defend peace and democratic trade unions.  
					 Speakers at the rally said that the results of the "elections to local self-governing bodies" clearly showed that the Lee Myung Bak regime could not stay in power with such plots as the "north wind" and "the theory on coloring." 
					
					 If Lee Myung Bak pursues the policy of confrontation and continues deteriorating the inter-Korean relations while paying no heed to the voices of the people, he will finally meet his destruction, they warned.
					
					 They called on all the people to turn out in the struggle to judge the group of traitors.

articles.title: Retraction of Bills on Retrogressive Revision of Laws Urged
articles.content:
Retraction of Bills on Retrogressive Revision of Laws Urged
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- South Korean civic and public organizations including the Confederation of Trade Unions, the Joint Conference of Human Rights Organizations, the Citizens' Solidarity for Democratic Society and the Solidarity for Progress on June 14 issued a letter of protest to be addressed to the "Grand National Party".
					 The letter said that the bills on retrogressively revising laws including "bill on revising the law on assembly and demonstration" which the GNP submitted to the "National Assembly" are arousing social concern. 
					
					 If the bills which call for totally banning evening rallies and   increasing the police authority, etc. pass through the "National Assembly", it will mean a crude infringement upon social democracy and the human rights of the people, the letter held. 
					
					 The letter urged the present "government" and the ruling party to stop such acts against democracy and human rights as suppressing the freedom of assembly and demonstration and fostering police fascist violence and immediately retract the above-mentioned bills.

articles.title: S. Korean Called on to Take Lead in Actions for Reunification
articles.content:
S. Korean Called on to Take Lead in Actions for Reunification
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- The Students Committee of the Youth and Students Solidarity for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration in south Korea had its inaugural ceremony and published a declaration on June 12. 
					 The declaration said the committee was inaugurated with confidence and desire for the nation's march for independent reunification making a dynamic advance on the occasion of the 10th anniversary of the June 15 joint declaration.
					
					 It appealed to all the youth and students to become standard-bearers for reunification by steadfastly carrying forward the spirit displayed in those days when they always stood in the van of the struggle under the banner of the joint declaration. 
					
					 It said that the organization will discharge its mission and role in intensifying the movement for reunification and the students movement and wage a dynamic struggle for national reunification against the U.S. and Lee Myung Bak.

articles.title: Impartial Discussion on "Cheonan" Case Urged
articles.content:
Impartial Discussion on "Cheonan" Case Urged
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- The south Korean People for Achieving Peace and Reunification with an organization of Koreans in the United States on June 14 sent a joint letter to the member nations of the UN Security Council requesting an impartial discussion on the case of warship "Cheonan" sinking. 
					 It recalled that the opposition parties, many civic and public organizations and non-governmental experts of south Korea are now repeatedly refuting and raising doubts about the "results of investigation" published by the Lee Myung Bak "government" as regards the case. 
					
					 The letter cited facts to prove the injustice of the "story about a torpedo attack," in particular. 
					
					 The letter went on:
					
					 South Korean non-governmental experts assert that the warship's stranding was the main factor of its sinking as the military authorities reported right after the incident took place. 
					
					 In the West Sea of Korea, the scene of the warship sinking, a submarine of the U.S. navy once collided with a fishing boat, the letter noted, adding that the south Korean people keep expressing suspicions that the warship "Cheonan" might collide with a submarine of the U.S. forces. 
					
					 Recalling that the DPRK is urging the south Korean "government" to accept its proposal for dispatching its inspection group, the letter continued: As even those concerned with the six-party talks are expressing their divergent views on the case, it is a natural order of work to make a scientific and objective clarification of the cause of the case if the UNSC is to discuss the said case. 
					
					 If the UNSC adopts a resolution or a presidential statement and others critical of the DPRK without scientific and objective grounds, this will seriously infringe upon its impartiality and result in disturbing peace on the Korean Peninsula and in the rest of the world, the letter stressed. 
					
					 On June 11, the south Korean Citizens' Solidarity for Democratic Society also sent a similar letter to the UNSC.

articles.title: "Cheonan" Case Dismissed as Charade
articles.content:
"Cheonan" Case Dismissed as Charade
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- Foreign media are bringing the truth about the sinking of warship "Cheonan" into bolder relief, dismissing it as a conspiratorial farce and charade orchestrated by the United States and the south Korean group of traitors to ridicule the world. 
					 The Japanese Asia-Pacific newspaper posted on Internet an article titled "Who sank warship 'Cheonan'" on May 24. It said that there happened strange sinking of a submarine near the waters where "Cheonan" sank almost at the same time, noting that the United States and south Korea are busy to keep the sub case into oblivion. 
					
					 Referring to the reason the U.S. is linking the case of "Cheonan" with the DPRK, the article said: 
					
					 The U.S. is in fear of having the trumps it is holding in settling the issue on the Korean Peninsula being taken away following the 2012 transfer of the "right to command the wartime operations" of the U.S. forces in south Korea. 
					
					 The U.S. munitions enterprises do not want to see the withdrawal of the U.S. forces from south Korea leading to the loss of the U.S. supremacy over East Asia but seek to create favorable atmosphere for launching a new war in Korea by taking the advantage of the case of "Cheonan". 
					
					 The recent farce, by all accounts, is aimed to deteriorate the inter-Korean relations and keep the U.S. armed forces in south Korea for an indefinite period. 
					
					 The Russian History Prospect Fund in commentaries posted on Internet on May 31 and June 1 made concrete analysis and estimation of the falsity of "material evidence" presented by the south Korean authorities and impossibility of the "torpedo attack by the DPRK".
					
					 On June 1 the Russian Internet News Pravaya quoting a U.S. journalist said that the case of "Cheonan" sinking was a sheer charade orchestrated by the United States. 
					
					 The French Internet paper Asia Times in its commentary on June 2 noted that the aim sought by Lee Myung Bak through the case of "Cheonan" sinking was to win "perfect partnership" with the U.S. and use the UN Security Council as a platform for discussing the Korean issue instead of the six-way talks. It also sought to use the case for arousing public interest in his "government" ahead of the "elections to local self-governing bodies" and, furthermore, create "security crisis" and thus secure a pretext of arms buildup and boost "strategic alliance" with the U.S.
					
					 On June 5 the paper also carried an article dedicated by a U.S. correspondent in Seoul. 
					
					 The article said that the conspiratorial nature of the case of "Cheonan" sinking is being brought to light with each passing day, proving it to be a farce orchestrated by the south Korean authorities. 
					
					 The majority south Korean people dismiss the "conclusion" drawn by the "investigation team" as a sheer lie, considering it as part of Lee Myung Bak's hostile policy toward the DPRK, not a case which was caused by a "torpedo attack" by it, the article noted, adding:
					
					 There is also a suspicion that the members of the "investigation team" were ordered to keep mum about the case.
					
					 Also problematic is why "Cheonan" sank at a time when the U.S. and south Korean forces were staging joint military exercises.

articles.title: Korean People's Struggle Supported
articles.content:
Korean People's Struggle Supported
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- The Pakistan Trade Union Federation, the Pakistan Peasants Committee, the Pakistan Organization for Afro-Asian People's Solidarity, the Pakistan Committee for Supporting Korea's Reunification and the Lahore Branch of the Pakistan-Korea Friendship Association issued a joint statement on June 9 on the occasion of the 10th anniversary of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 Kim Jong Il, the great leader of the Korean people, provided the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and made sure that measures were taken for its implementation, the statement noted, fully supporting those measures and extending militant solidarity to the Korean people in their struggle to achieve the country's reunification. 
					
					 The statement urged the U.S. Administration to drop the hostile policy toward the DPRK and withdraw its armed forces from south Korea so that the Korean people may reunify the country independently and peacefully free from foreign forces' interference in their internal affairs. 
					
					 The National Committee of the Genuine Lumumbist Patriotic Party of Democratic Congo in a statement on June 10 urged traitor Lee Myung Bak of south Korea to respect the north-south joint declaration, create a favorable circumstance for peaceful reunification and accept the will of all the Korean people in the north and the south and abroad for the country's reunification.
					
					 It urged the U.S. to respond to the fair proposal of the DPRK government to replace the Armistice Agreement with a peace treaty and stop the reckless military exercises against the DPRK.

articles.title: Important Day of DPRK Marked
articles.content:
Important Day of DPRK Marked
Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- Seminars on General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work were held in Democratic Congo and Nigeria, meetings, lectures, book and photo exhibitions and film shows in Norway, Sweden, India and Russia from June 8 to 12 on the occasion of the 46th anniversary of his start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The chairman of the Youth Group for the Study of the Juche Idea in Democratic Congo and other speakers said that the ever victorious Workers' Party of Korea shining with the august name of President Kim Il Sung and Korean socialism winning victory after victory would be unthinkable without the energetic ideological and theoretical activities and leadership of Kim Jong Il. The Korean people will surely emerge victorious in their struggle to build a thriving nation and achieve the country's reunification under his leadership, they noted.
					
					 The chairman of the Nigerian Group for the Study of Kimjongilism said in a report at a seminar that it is very essential for the people of all countries to preserve the Juche character and national character under the condition where each nation-state carries out its own revolution and construction.
					
					 The chairman of the Communist Party of Norway in a speech at a meeting noted with appreciation that Kim Jong Il firmly defended Korean-style socialism with the arms of justice and independence under the uplifted banner of Songun to cope with the vicious anti-DPRK and anti-socialist offensive launched by the U.S.-led imperialist allied forces toward the end of the last century.
					
					The acting international secretary of the Communist Party of Sweden said in a lecture that 
						Kim Jong Il's Songun leadership holds the most distinguished position among all those feats he performed to safeguard and defend socialism.
					
					 A message of greetings to Kim Jong Il was adopted at a meeting in Norway.

articles.title: Anniversary of Joint Declaration Observed in Peru
articles.content:
Anniversary of Joint Declaration Observed in Peru
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- A solidarity meeting was held in the building of the Peruvian Teachers'  Unique Trade Union and a seminar by the Peruvian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism on June 6 and 9 on the occasion of the 10th anniversary of the historic June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 The chairman of the Peruvian Committee for Supporting the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea, the secretary general of the Peruvian-Korean Institute of Culture and Friendship and other personages said in their speeches at the meeting that President Kim Il Sung put forward the fair proposals and ways to terminate the country's division and present a reunified country to the Korean people.
					
					General Secretary Kim Jong Il provided the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration, a milestone of Korea's reunification, with his broad magnanimity and bold decision true to the cause of the President, they said, adding: This is a great feat to shine long in the history of the nation.
					
					 They accused the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors of having orchestrated the sinking case of warship "Cheonan" and getting frantic in its moves to stifle the DPRK in collusion with the U.S. imperialists while undisguisedly denying the inter-Korean joint declarations and pushing the inter-Korean relations to the worst phase.
					
					 The chairman of the Peruvian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism in a speech praised the immortal feats performed by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il for national reunification. 
					
					 A message of solidarity to Kim Jong Il was adopted at the seminar.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Start of Work at WPK Celebrated
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Start of Work at WPK Celebrated
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- Members of the Democratic Women's Union of Korea held a meeting at the plaza of the Arch of Triumph on June 17 on the occasion of the 46th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Speeches were made at the meeting following a report by Ro Song Sil, chairwoman of the Central Committee of the union.
					
					 The reporter and speakers said that Kim Jong Il developed the WPK to be the glorious party of President Kim Il Sung and a powerful force guiding the Songun revolution.
					
					 They noted that a shining reality was brought about on the socialist homeland thanks to Kim Jong Il's patriotic devotion.
					
					 They stressed the need to vigorously launch a general offensive for improving the standard of people's living in all places for effecting a great surge true to the intention of the WPK to make this year a year of prosperity replete with people's happiness and thus fully demonstrate the patriotic stamina of the Korean women in the Songun era.

articles.title: Story of Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Story of Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- One day in August Juche 92 (2003) General Secretary Kim Jong Il visited the Pyongyang Cosmetics Factory.
					 After looking around the production processes of the factory, he was guided to the sample room.  
					
					 Exhibited in the room were different sorts of quality cosmetics produced by the factory.
					
					 He took a lipstick in his hand and looked at it.
					
					He then told officials that the factory was producing lipsticks of only a few colors and that it should produce such cosmetics as foundation, lipstick and face powder in various colors so that women could take their choice suitable to their face color and taste.

articles.title: Acto central por efemeride coreana
articles.content:
Acto central por efemeride coreana
Pyongyang, 18 de junio (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 18 en la capitalina Casa Cultural 25 de Abril el acto central dedicado al 46o aniversario del inicio del trabajo del Dirigente Kim Jong Il en el Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea (PTC).
					En la ocasion participaron los cuadros del partido, el ejercito y el Estado, los funcionarios de las instituciones del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el poder, las entidades sociales, los ministerios y los organos centrales, los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea, los funcionarios de los dominios de ciencia, educacion,  cultura y  arte, salud publica, prensa e informacion, y los trabajadores capitalinos.
					
					El miembro suplente del Buro Politico y secretario del CC del PTC, Choe Thae Bok, subrayo en su informe de la ocasion que el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, con la ferrea voluntad de llevar a feliz termino de generacion en generacion la causa revolucionaria del Juche, comenzo el 19 de junio del 53 (1964) de la Era Juche el trabajo en el CC del PTC, lo cual fue el acontecimiento historico que reviste el significado trascendental en el desarrollo del PTC y de la revolucion coreana y continuo: 
					
					Desde los primeros dias del inicio del trabajo en el CC del PTC, el Dirigente presento como la tarea de toda su vida fortalecerlo como el partido del Presidente Kim Il Sung. Aclaro el principio de que el partido revolucionario es en su esencia el partido del lider y la organizacion politica para realizar la idea y la direccion de este, y lo materializo con brillantez en la construccion y las actividades del partido.
					
					Gracias a la sabia direccion del Dirigente quien practica globalmente la politica de beneficios, la abarcadora del amor y confianza, el PTC pudo conducir al pueblo coreano responsabilizandose enteramente de su destino aun en medio de la gran tempestad politica mundial, convertir toda la sociedad en una gran familia armoniosa y orientar rectamente la causa de la construccion socialista  disfrutando el absoluto apoyo y la confianza de las masas populares.
					
					El Dirigente hizo que el partido revolucionario defendiera el socialismo y lo llevara adelante con las fuerzas armadas. El Dirigente mantuvo invariablemente este principio en toda la trayectoria de su direccion al partido. 
					
					El Dirigente fortalecio el Ejercito Popular de Corea como el del lider y del partido y como el poderoso ejercito capaz de combatir uno contra cien enemigos.
					
					 Gracias a tener al Dirigente, el PTC mantuvo la linea de la reunificacion independiente frustrando a cada paso las maniobras de provocacion politica y militar de las fuerzas divisionistas internas y externas bajo la bandera de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio, jalon de la reunificacion de la patria, y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre, elevo mas la autoridad y posicion exteriores del pais aun en medio de la compleja situacion mundial y fortalecio extraordinariamente la solidaridad internacional con la revolucion coreana.
					
					 El Dirigente es el gran simbolo del PTC que sale siempre victorioso y el destino de la patria y la nacion.
					
					 En el futuro tambien, seguiremos prestando una fuerza primordial a la materializacion de la linea de la revolucion del Songun del PTC para fortalecer por todos los medios la posicion militar del pais cuyo nucleo es el Ejercito Popular de Corea y garantizar fidedignamente en lo militar la construccion de la gran potencia prospera socialista, la reunificacion de la patria y la culminacion de la causa revolucionaria del Juche.
					
					 Hoy en dia, en la Peninsula Coreana se crea una situacion grave en que pueda estallar una guerra en cualquier momento, debido a las maniobras de la banda de los traidores surcoreanos que fabrico el incidente de hundimiento de la corbeta "Cheonan", en contubernio con Estados Unidos, y recurre locamente a las intrigas de confrontacion anti-RPDC sin precedentes. 
					
					 Si los reaccionarios norteamericanos y japoneses y la banda de los traidores titeres provocan por fin la guerra, pese a las advertencias repetidas de la RPDC, el ejercito y el pueblo de todo el pais, con vehemente  indignacion y hostilidad se levantaran con valentia en la sagrada guerra por la defensa de la patria para dar golpe demoledor a cualquier "castigo merecido" y la "venganza" y a cualquier "sancion" que atenta los intereses estatales de la RPDC y construiran sin falta la gran potencia prospera reunificada sobre esta tierra eliminando por completo la fuente raigal de la agresion y la guerra.
					
					 En adelante tambien, fortaleceremos la unidad y la solidaridad con los pueblos progresistas del mundo y desarrollaremos las relaciones con los paises que tratan amistosamente con la RPDC, bajo la bandera de la independencia, la paz y la amistad, y lucharemos dinamicamente por la estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana y la paz del mundo.
					
					 Por tener al Dirigente Kim Jong Il al frente del PTC, seguira el avance victorioso del PTC, como el partido del Presidente Kim Il Sung y fuerza orientadora de la causa de la revolucion del Songun, y es infinitamente radiante y prometedor su futuro.

articles.title: Acto conmemorativo por 19 de Junio
articles.content:
Acto conmemorativo por 19 de Junio
Pyongyang, 18 de junio (ATCC) -- En ocasion del 46o aniversario del inicio del trabajo del Dirigente Kim Jong Il en el Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, tuvo lugar el dia 17 en la explanada ante el Arco de Triunfo el acto conmemorativo de las integrantes de la Union de Mujeres Democraticas de Corea.
					En la ocasion hubo el informe de ocasion de la presidenta de la citada union e intervenciones.
					
					Las oradoras destacaron que el Dirigente fortalecio el Partido del Trabajo de Corea como el partido glorioso del Presidente Kim Il Sung y como una poderosa fuerza orientadora de la revolucion del Songun.
					
					Prosiguieron que gracias a la abnegacion patriotica del Dirigente se extendio una deslumbrante realidad sobre la tierra patria socialista.
					
					Tambien exhortaron a mostrar sin reserva el espiritu patriotico de las mujeres coreanas de la epoca del Songun al desplegar dinamicamente la ofensiva general por la mejora de la vida del pueblo en todos los lugares de la campana del gran auge en acato al proposito del partido de hacer de 2010 un ano en que florece plenamente la felicidad del pueblo.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun elogia declaracion conjunta de partidos y entidades
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun elogia declaracion conjunta de partidos y entidades
Pyongyang, 18 de junio (ATCC) -- Los partidos politicos y entidades de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea hicieron publica el pasado dia 15 una declaracion conjunta con motivo del 10o aniversario de la publicacion de la Declaracion Conjunta Norte-Sur del 15 de Junio. 
					En un comentario individual de este viernes, el diario Rodong Sinmun lo califica de medida oportuna para hacer frente a la situacion severa de hoy en que la banda de conservadores titeres del Sur de Corea lleva a la ruptura las relaciones intercoreanas y esta desesperada para provocar la guerra de agresion contra la RPDC invalidando e impidiendo la ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio en contubernio con las fuerzas extranjeras, y continua:
					
					 La posicion de principios aclarada por los partidos politicos y entidades de la RPDC mediante su declaracion conjunta aborda los problemas imprescindibles y claves para acelerar el avance victorioso de la causa de reunificacion de la patria superando las dificultades creadas. 
					
					 La unica via para salvar las relaciones Norte-Sur ahora en la fase catastrofica es respetar y poner en practica la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre. 
					
					 Para defender y ejecutar estas Declaraciones, es preciso lograr la gran unidad de las masas de distintos estratos en el Norte, el Sur y en ultramar que las apoyan. 
					
					  Es invariable la posicion de la RPDC de discutir y solucionar el problema de relaciones intercoreanas y el de reunificacion cooperando segun el espiritu de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales" con todas las fuerzas politicas, entidades y personalidades en el Sur de Corea y en ultramar que apoyan las declaraciones intercoreanas. 
					
					Pero, castigara duro a nombre de la nacion a cualesquier elementos que nieguen la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y actuen en contrasentido a su espiritu.
					
					  EE.UU. debe abandonar su politica hostil a la RPDC y dejar de intervenir en los problemas coreanos y de actuar injustamente contra la ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio. 
					
					  Hay que expulsar del poder a la banda de Lee Myung Bak que esta enloquecida por la confrontacion y la guerra en contubernio con las fuerzas extranjeras.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun aboga por mantener el espiritu juche y nacionalidad
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun aboga por mantener el espiritu juche y nacionalidad
Pyongyang, 18 de junio (ATCC) -- La obra del Dirigente Kim Jong Il "Para mantener el espiritu Juche y la nacionalidad en el proceso revolucionario y constructivo" publicada el 19 de junio del 86 (1997) de la Era Juche, es un documento monumental que ilumino claramente el camino para defender la soberania del pais y lograr la prosperidad nacional frustrando las maquinaciones dominacionistas de los imperialistas.
					Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual difundido este viernes y continua:
					
					El trabajo estipula perfectamente la esencia del problema de mantener el espiritu Juche y la nacionalidad en la revolucion y la construccion, su importancia y significado y los asuntos teoricos y practicos que se presentan en mantener estos principios revolucionarios.
					
					Gracias a tener la poderosa arma ideo-teorica dada por el Dirigente, el ejercito y el pueblo de Corea pudieron frustrar rotundamente la presion politica y militar y la penetracion ideologica y cultural de los imperialistas, mantener con firmeza la bandera socialista del Juche y hacer brillar en el mundo la dignidad de la nacion coreana.
					
					Mantener el espiritu Juche y la nacionalidad es la garantia fundamental para defender la dignidad independiente del pais y la nacion, y defenderlos es la demanda importante para construir sobre la tierra patria la gran potencia prospera de autoconfianza.
					
					Tambien eso es la demanda principal para defender firmemente el caracter connatural del socialismo y poner de pleno manifiesto la superioridad del socialismo al estilo coreano.
					
					El espiritu Juche y la nacionalidad que mantiene invariablemente el Dirigente, son el espiritu eterno del pueblo coreano y la fuerza motriz ideo-espiritual por el avance victorioso de la revolucion coreana.
